An integral transformation defined as \\( w(t) = \\int_0^t e^{At}z(s) ds \\), where A is a constant complex number is applied.

If at t = T/2, an intervention modifies \\( z(t) \\) as \\( z'(t) = z(t) + ce^{Dt} \\) where D is another constant and c a constant vector, will \\( w(T) \\) still be primarily determined by the original matrix A?
